title: Band, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: stem stitches tightly pulled to create openwork in plain weave; warps and wefts in groups of three
description: Four fragments of a band with a repeating pattern of a curved vine in reserve on a natural colored ground with a red embroidered background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 17th century.Medium: linen, silk
Technique: stem stitches tightly pulled to create openwork in plain weave; warps and wefts in groups of three. 1975-54-3-a/d.
